title: Looking for players for rank team!
body:
Currently don't have positions filled:


ADC (Needed)
Support (Needed)
Mid (Needed)
Top (Needed)
JG (Needed
Please have TS(Team Speak) If you're willing to play. Communication is needed! Shot Caller would be great too!
IGN-AHFLOW Taiga

replies.body: Add me if u want jg,  d3,  ign:mattsherona
Ye man add me in game:)

Hey,

Add me if you're interested.

I've played competitive over 3 years in dota 2 scene in a high skill cap of 4000mmr.

However in league i only started end of s5 so i could rank up or it didnt count anyway made it to gold 1.

I mainly play mid which it gives me more control over how the game will go and i am a team player who loves making them plays for the adc.

I play any character in mid and jungle.

But the ones i am most comfortable with in mid and jungle are the following;

Mid: fizz azir lee zed yas leblanc annie nunu orianna GP

Jungler: diana lee yi elise j4 wukong

I can fill out any role but them two are my main, test me out see if you like :)
Ye man i hit u up
i can adc s1 currently trying 2 get inro gold 5 almost there add if u want me 2 join i will be happy 2 get 2 gold first
I'm b5 but deserve diamond easily, I can fill in for every role,  I play 3 champs: yi, teemo and shaco. Add me if ur interested in me skillz.
